name: negligibly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is too slight or small in amount to be of importance: Girls are now only negligibly behind boys in maths and science. This effect was found to be negligibly small for the present data. See
negligible
More examplesFewer examples My phone bill has increased negligibly in the past few years.This statistic varies only negligibly from one group to another.Their results were only negligibly different.
